title: Novhorodka Raion
text:
Novhorodka Raion was a <a href="raion">raion</a> (district) of <a href="Kirovohrad%20Oblast">Kirovohrad Oblast</a> in central <a href="Ukraine">Ukraine</a>. The administrative center of the raion was the <a href="urban-type%20settlement">urban-type settlement</a> of <a href="Novhorodka">Novhorodka</a>. The raion was abolished on 18 July 2020 as part of the administrative reform of Ukraine, which reduced the number of raions of Kirovohrad Oblast to four. The area of Novhorodka Raion was merged into <a href="Kropyvnytskyi%20Raion">Kropyvnytskyi Raion</a>. The last estimate of the raion population was .
At the time of disestablishment, the raion consisted of one <a href="hromada">hromada</a>, <a href="Novhorodka%20settlement%20hromada">Novhorodka settlement hromada</a> with the administration in Novhorodka.
